ValidationRule.description: Validate if Fund Customer sales org matches with user sales org
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !$Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c, OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Anchor_Account__c )), cgcloud__Anchor_Account__r.cgcloud__Sales_Org__c <> Text( $User.cgcloud__Sales_Org__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The User and the Anchor Customer must have the same Sales Org.
